siteMetadata.description:
Pervasive, Persuasive, Personalized, Positive Computing Laboratory (P4C Lab)
         is a human-computer interaction research group at the Kangwon National University, Republic of Korea. 
         Our research aims to lead everyone to stay in good shape and have healthy mental 
         by designing enjoyable and interactive services that leverage mobile/ubiquitous 
         technologies, machine learning/artificial intelligence, and behavioral psychology/economics.

frontmatter.title: Intelligent Contingency Management using Reinforcement Learning for Health Behavior Promotion in Everyday Life
Development of Intelligent Interaction Technology Based on Context Awareness and Human Intention Understanding

nodes.excerpt: In the pre-college program for freshmen, Spring, 2024, A digital literacy course, Understanding AI for seventy students, is provided.
